subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Manny Pacquiao’s technical knockout of Oscar De La Hoya on Saturday night generated 1.25 million pay-per-view purchases and $70 million in revenue. It is the fourth nonheavyweight bout to break one million buys in boxing’s pay-per-view history. “While it’s a tough economy, and that may have dampened the results somewhat, it’s still a strong number,” said Mark Taffet, a senior vice president of HBO Sports, which produced and distributed the fight.
